document_data.name: Ring of the Unquenchable
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ring of the Unquenchable''' was an [[efreeti]] military force located in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Activities: Though they were a slave legion, the efreeti [[mamluk]]s of the Ring of the Unquenchable were favored by the [[Marrake al-Sidan al-Hariq ben Lazan|Sultan]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The City of Brass served as the base of the Ring of the Unquenchable. Their barracks were located near the [[Charcoal Palace]] and the major mosques
